name: Newt
description: Newt is an experimental microservice providing two stage data routing, form data validation, simple static file services. Newt can route data from a request to a JSON or S3 data source (e.g. Postgres+PostgREST, Minio instance) and then take the results and run them through Pandoc server.
releaseNotes: This release is focused on integrating support for S3 object stores. Providing SQL for bootstraping application built around Postgres+PostgREST and Pandoc is split into a separate command replacing the prior pg-setup SQL, pg-models SQL and pg-models-test SQL options in the newt command.
softwareRequirements: A front end web server supporting reverse proxy (e.g. Apache2, NginX)
